Articles.Content: So I was wondering, I have KSP, I bought it on the website, I'd kinda like to track my hours and acheivements, etc, through steam, how would one make that possible with having bought KSP through the website?

KSP doesn't have achievements, but you can track your hours by adding it to your Steam library as a non-steam game. Go to your library, click "Add a game" in the bottom left corner, and then "Add a non-steam game". You may have to browse for KSP.exe if it isn't on the list.
